- ### SR Flip-Flop

|$S$|$R$|$Qn+1$|
|---|---|---|
|$0$|$0$|$Qn$|
|$0$|$1$|$0$|
|$1$|$0$|$1$|
|$1$|$1$|$NA$|

- ### JK Flip-Flop

|$J$|$K$|$Qn+1$|
|---|---|---|
|$0$|$0$|$Qn$|
|$0$|$1$|$0$|
|$1$|$0$|$1$|
|$1$|$1$|$\overline{Qn}$|

- ### D Flip-Flop

|$D$|$Qn+1$|
|---|---|
|$0$|$0$|
|$1$|$1$|

- ### Toggle Flip-Flop

|$T$|$Qn+1$|
|---|---|
|$0$|$Qn$|
|$1$|$\overline{Qn}$|
